import requests
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data

# Component Criado Por Fabricando Sua Ideia Se Inscreva no Canal: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais
# Component Created By Making Your Idea Subscribe to the Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class WhatsAppMessageSender(Component):
    display_name = "WhatsApp Message Sender"
    description = "Send a message using the official Meta Cloud WhatsApp API. Follow Me: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais"
    documentation: str = "https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages/"
    icon = "message-circle-reply"

    # Definindo os inputs do componente
    # Defining the component inputs
    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="token",
            display_name="Token",
            info="Access token for WhatsApp API",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="version",
            display_name="API Version",
            info="API version, for example: v20.0",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="phone_number_id",
            display_name="Phone Number ID",
            info="WhatsApp Sender Phone Number ID",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="recipient_phone_number",
            display_name="Número do Destinatário",
            info="Recipient's phone number in international format with country code EX: 5511985515990",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="message_body",
            display_name="Corpo da Mensagem",
            info="Text of the message to be sent",
        ),
    ]

    # Definindo os outputs do componente
    # Defining the component outputs
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Resultado", name="resultado", method="send_message"),
    ]

    def send_message(self) -> Data:
        token = self.token
        version = self.version
        phone_number_id = self.phone_number_id
        recipient_phone_number = self.recipient_phone_number
        message_body = self.message_body

        # Montando o URL da API do WhatsApp
        # Building the WhatsApp API URL
        url = f"https://graph.facebook.com/{version}/{phone_number_id}/messages"
        
        # Cabeçalhos da requisição
        headers = {
            "Authorization": f"Bearer {token}",
            "Content-Type": "application/json"
        }

        # Corpo da requisição (payload)
        # Request body (payload)
        payload = {
            "messaging_product": "whatsapp",
            "recipient_type": "individual",
            "to": recipient_phone_number,
            "type": "text",
            "text": {
                "preview_url": False,
                "body": message_body
            }
        }

        try:
            # Fazendo a requisição POST para o WhatsApp API
            # Making the POST request to the WhatsApp API
            response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload)
            response.raise_for_status()  # Lança uma exceção em caso de erro na requisição
            # Throws an exception in case of an error in the request

            # Retornando o resultado da requisição
            # Returning the request result
            return Data(data={"result": response.json()})
        
        except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as err:
            # Captura e retorna o erro, caso haja falha
            # Catch and return the error if there is a failure
            return Data(data={"error": str(err)})
